description:
FeedReader is a powerful and free RSS Feed Aggregator and PodCatcher.

It supports searching both feeds and story titles and updates feeds in the background at an interval you can choose.

FeedRader comes with no preset feeds, but you can freely add as many feeds as you like.
It supports RSS0.9x, RSS1.0, RSS2.0 and ATOM1.0. Audio and video podcasts are also supported.
All feeds are automatically merged into an all-items feed.
You can view the whole stories using FeedReader or be directly redirected to the Browser app for maximum flexibility (this can be configured on a per-feed basis). Stories can be viewed with full HTML support.
Furthermore, feeds and stories can be send via e-mail. 

FeedReader itself supports English, German, French and Spanish. Support is available in English & German. 

Feel free to contact me, if you encounter a bug or miss a feature.
